overview: There's a creative storm brewing at the publisher of a sizzling skin magazine. A writer named Ms. Randall is hired to work with temperamental photographer Devin. More than sparks fly when the two of them collaborate on the hottest photo-shoot you'll ever see! Publisher Ms. Corsley is upset from the conflict. But a fantasy fling with Joey Silvera and some relaxing girl-girl action with model Sharon Kane calms her down fast!
title: Art of Passion
